title: Riot's smurf detection sucks.
body:
Rolled a new account. Level 15 now. Still getting matched with and against players with < 5 games under their belt. People say "It can take a couple dozen games", but I've played over 50 games so far, and it's still happening.

Pls rito, htfu and mark me as a fucking smurf already.

Inb4 "Hurr durr don't make a new account if you don't want to play against new players" as me being matched with and against brand new players is as unfair for them as it is boring for me.

replies.body: Maybe it's an ad, but take a look! Im doing daily Katarina content (plus other champs!) Customs skins and montages/gameplay! You should take a look if you love daily League content. Maybe you'll love it! :yum:  https://www.youtube.com/c/MihuKat
the account MareauAU if that's your account and going bad with neeko that must be telling you something you belong there xD
Might have something to do with almost all the "smurfs" being Iron on their accounts.
